name: arifos
summary: Constitutional AI governance with 13 immutable floors (F1-F13). Trinity architecture (AGI·ASI·APEX) with 25 MCP servers mapped to constitutional enforcement. Thermodynamic physics (Delta_S->0, Peace_squared>=1, Omega_0 in [0.03,0.05]), tri-witness consensus (>=0.95), zkPC cryptographic sealing. Production-hardened 000-999 metabolic loop. Works with ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and any LLM.
